tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.7
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDAYS False isArrayJD False isArrayET False isArrayP False output_data_HOURS $output_data_HOURS name SAGA.climate_tools.7 DAYS $DAYS JD $JD ET $ET P $P LAT $LAT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_HOURS $OutputSection_HOURS.outputType_HOURS transmissionMode_HOURS $OutputSection_HOURS.transmissionMode_HOURS

param.name: DAYS
param.label: Daily Data
param.help: Daily Data The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: JD
param.label: Julian Day
param.help: Julian Day The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ET
param.label: Evapotranspiration
param.help: Evapotranspiration The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: P
param.label: Precipitation
param.help: Precipitation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_HOURS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Derive hourly from daily evapotranspiration using sinusoidal distribution.
